name: Nandini
greetingText: I really like your observation and positive energy
wishText: Krishn ji tumhe duniya ki har woh khushi dein jo tum deserve karti ho!!
textInChatBox: Happy birthday to you!! Yeee! Many many happy blah...
text2: That's what I was going to do
text4: I realised, I should to do something
outroText1: Okay, now come back and tell me if you liked it
outroText2: Ek baar tumne kaha tha na, tum khush hogi agar main tumhe WIN kar loon. To truly win you. I believe we need to genuinely connect.I’m not here to waste either of our time — I really see a future with you. If you’re open let’s talk and see where this goes. Aur agar tum comfortable nahi ho, toh main tumhara decision respect karunga… you immediately block me. So, main tumhe disturb nahi karunga
replayText: Or click if you want to watch it again.
